days.text: Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. Mist at first. Light rain at first. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
